amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to require, to the extent practicable, DoD shall give preference for military construction contracts to firms who certify that at least 51 percent of employees hired to perform the contract shall reside in the same State or within a 60-mile radius and requires all contractors and subcontractors for military construction (MilCon) projects be licensed in the state where the work is to be performed, and requires Congressional notification on major MilCon contracting/subcontracting awards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kim (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A010) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kim (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Kim (NJ) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Kim (NJ).
